doc.field: Turkey travel materials, notes, correspondence, pamphlets, reports. NY State Labor Relations Board briefs and materials. Clippings re: Men in Uniform. CUNY budget and materials. Institute for Labor Relations proposal (Baruch College). "What's New in Collective Bargaining Negotiations and Contracts" newsletters. UF CT documents. "Legislative Digest" reports. Taylor Law materials. Board of Education materials. Newspapers, newsletters, pamphlets, booklets. Marathon Oil Co. annual report (1972). Analysis of SEEK Budget (spreadsheet). League for Industrial Democracy materials. "Jewish-American Unionism, Its Birth Pangs and Contribution to the General American Labor Movement" (pamphlet). Labor Mediation Exam (1954). Labor racketeering clippings.
